intro: Neovriesia macrostachya, commonly known as the giant sand mat, is a flowering plant native to the arid regions of southern Africa. It is characterized by its sprawling growth habit and produces large, showy yellow flowers that bloom in summer. The plant has a fibrous root system adapted to survive in sandy, nutrient-poor soils. Its leaves are typically narrow and covered in a fine, white coating that helps reduce water loss. Neovriesia macrostachya is often used in xeriscaping due to its drought tolerance and ornamental value.
